ref.div: • Bondzio JH, Morlighem M, Seroussi H, Kleiner T, Rückamp M, Mouginot J, Moon T, Larour EY, Humbert A (2017) The mechanisms behind Jakobshavn Isbrae’s acceleration and mass loss: a 3D thermomechanical model study. Geophys Res Lett. 10.1002/2017GL073309. A modeling study that shows that calving front position is the dominant control for changes in the Jakobshavn Isbrae glacier over the last two decades.
